title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Cartman's house, day. Cartman and his friends sit on the sofa watching TV

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And so, in her career filled with lies, backstabbing, and whoring herself for money,  she learned that the price of fame can be pleasing 65 men at once in a dark, dirty alley.  And so ends "Punky Brewster, Behind The Blow."

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Whoa, bummer, dude.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Okay, dude, it's 3:30.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It's time for the Terrance & Phillip Show!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yay!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Excuse me, buddy.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Why, did you fart?  Oh, no!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh man, this is another rerun.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Are you sure? I haven't seen it.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah, fatass, this is their famous Mechanic sketch.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I'm looking for a mechanic. Can you tell me how to get to the auto garage?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Sure, buddy! All you need to do is go down to the , and that's how you  get to the auto garage!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Can you tell me how to get to the auto garage without farting?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Sure. You go the same way  except stick your finger up your ass.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: No no no! I mean, could you tell me the directions again without you farting?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: OOOH! Sure! Just stick your finger up my ass.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright, no problem, buddy.  Now, tell me: How do I get to the auto garage to see a mechanic?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You're at the auto garage. I am the mechanic.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Why the heck didn't you tell me you were the mechanic?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Because I had an itch up my ass.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Because I had an itch up my ass.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Cut to next scene, where they are working on toilet plumbing

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Terrance & Phillip will be right back...

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: ...after these messages.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Cut to Cartman's living room

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: When are they gonna make new ones?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hey kids, don't miss the greatest event of the year! This Thursday night at the Denver Coliseum, see Terrance and Phillip LIVE! And in person

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What's this?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Announcer 3	[scenes from various episodes appear] One night and
text: one night only, see all your favorite Terrance and Phillip bits live! [Kenny starts babbling incoherently]

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh my God!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You guys! Hey you guys! You guys!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Enough! I know!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: To order tickets, call TicketSlave NOW!!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Write the number down! Write the number down!!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park Elementary, day. Class is ready to start, the kids are in their seats. Kyle rushes to his seat

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Dude! Did you get 'em?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I got 'em! Four tickets, 68th row, to Terrance and Phillip! I waited in line since 3 this morning!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Awesome! Give me mine!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Wow, yuh-you guys ore gonna see Terrance and Phillip Live?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yep. Tomorrow night.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright, children, let's settle down. As you know, this coming Friday is Earth Day.  and I'm pleased to announce that the national Earth Day organization has chosen South Park as its location for the Earth Day Brainwashing Festival.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oohh.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The heads of the Earth Day Brainwashing organization are here to tell you all about it.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hello children, I know you're all very excited about having the Earth Day Brainwashing Festival put on in your town.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You care very much about the earth, don't you?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yes.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Good, because it's up to all of you to get lots of people to come.and make it look great. The festival is on Friday, so we'll start getting it ready tomorrow night.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What??

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We've all gotta pitch in

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, I'm sorry, but the four of us can't help tomorrow night.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You... what??

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well we got tickets to see Terrance and Phillip Live in Denver tomorrow night. We paid forty bucks apiece for them.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And Terrance and Phillip are more important than Mother Earth?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well yeah, dude.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You don't care about Terrance and Phillip. Nothing matters more than saving the planet from Republicans.  You don't need to see Terrance and Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: No, dude, we really, really do.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Their will is strong.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I'm sorry, boys, but nothing's more important than Earth Day.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Uhuh, but that's why we're going.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Huh?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Sww, w-we're the official presidents of the Phillip and Terrance Fan Club. A- and... we're... going to see them tomorrow 'cause we can get them to perform at the Earth Day festival.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You can get Terrance and Phillip to perform?  That would be great. Terrance and Phillip would draw huge ratings from children all over the country.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Very well, kids, we'll work on getting the event ready here, and you go get Terrance and Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: All right!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But I warn you: You'd better not promise things to Earth Day people that you can't deliver. Earth Day people can be... eheheh very unforgiving.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Heheh, heh, no problem, heh. No problem!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Denver Coliseum, the following night. The place is packed and music plays in the background. The boys all sport their Terrance and Phillip shirts, as do some other kids.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ladies and gentlemen!  Put your hands together for... Terrance!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hellooo, Den-ver!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Wow, dude, Terrance got really fat.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah, he looks terrible.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: How are we all feeling tonight? Pretty good?  Uh oh.  Hey, do you all remember this one?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: "Doctor, doctor. I think I cracked my ass."

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Uuuuhh.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Where the hell is Phillip?! Phil-lip!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Phil-lip!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Phil-lip! Phil-lip! Phil-lip! Phil-lip!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And now, for some classic Terrance and Phillip comedy!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hello Terrance.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hello Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Phillip? That's not Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Say, Phillip, I have a question for you.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ho-okay, shoot.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Dude, what the hell is going on?! Why did they replace Phillip?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I think this new guy's funny.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And now here's a classic Terrance and Phillip sketch that I wrote back in '62.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Excuse me, sir. Do you know Who farted?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: He sure did.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What's the person's ?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Who.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The guy that farted!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Who!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The person that passed gas!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Who passed gas!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Now, why are you asking me?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's the man's name?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's Who's name?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yes!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Something very terrible has happened in the world of Terrance and Phillip, and we've got to find out what.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look, buddy, all I'm trying to find out is What's the guy's name that farted?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Right, the guy that drank his own urine.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Who?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Denver Coliseum, later. Stan and friend walk down the corridors backstage, heading to Terrance's dressing room

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Come on, guys, we're getting to the bottm of this.  'Scuse us.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Where do you think you're going?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We have to talk to Terrance.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hyeah, right.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It's okay. We're the official presidents of the Terrance and Phillip fan club.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Then get in the "Official Presidents of the Terrance and Phillip Fan Club" line.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Aw, dude, gay!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You don't understand: we saved Terrance and Phillip's lives once.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You and about a thousand other people at one time or another. Now, get out of my face!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Racist!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Man, this sucks!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Are you guys official presidents, too?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Don't talk to us, kid.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hey! Look at that line!  It's way shorter.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I don't think we're female groupies or random sluts.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Kenny's a random slut.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well, maybe we can sneak in over there. Come on.  Sshh.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Terrance's dressing room. He and a groupie are making out on the sofa, both moaning.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Mmm. Mmm, yummy.  Mmm.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It was so great meeting you. I feel like we really shared something.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We sure did, baby.  Next?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hello Terrance. I'm such a huuuge fan.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You're a huge fan alright!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Can I just have you sign my breasts?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But what do I get in return?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Whatever you want.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh yeah.  Oh, that's good, baby.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh, Terrance, I love you.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You like that?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I love you!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I LOVE you!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah good.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I LOVE YOIU!!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah-

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: OH!!!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Agh! Wough! Man, it smells down there!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Jesus Christ! That was fast! Well, what should we name it? How about Jerry?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What the hell?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh wow! We had quadruplets!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We're not quadruplets, Terrance. We snuck in that woman's spandex to get in here.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh! Thank God. The last thing I need is more kids.  What do you want, an autograph or something?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Nuh, it's more important than that. Our school is putting on a big show for Earth Day, and we promised people we could get you to perform.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Earth Day, huh? That sounds like a very noble cause. How much does it pay?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But where's Phillip?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Who?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Phillip, your partner.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Why is it that every time somebody sees me they have to say, "Hey, where's Phillip?" Like we're freaking married or something! You know, I'll let you tater-tots in on a little secret: Phillip is a HACK! You know who wrote all the Terrance and Phillip stuff? ME! Phillip never did anything but read his lines!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But the guy who replaced him sucks!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, I know.  I know he sucks  To be honest, things haven't been going so well lately. I'm not making any money because everyone wants to see Phillip. Why? What the hell does Phillip do?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Becuase, dude, it's Terrance and Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ogh, whatever.  The point is, Phillip and I are through.  And apparently, so is the act. And so is the money.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What if we can get Phillip to agree to get back together. Will you do the Earth Day show for us?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: HA! Goood luck getting Phillip! He left because he wanted to do  "more serious" stuff. Last I heard, he was doing Canadian Shakespeare in Toronto.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (Toronto?)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But we promised the Earth Day people you'd perform.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well, in that case, I'd say you four boys are up Fart Creek without a paddle.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: "SOUTH PARK Home of Earth Day Celebration 2001," day. Booths are being set up for the festival. The heads of the Earth Day Brainwashing Festival make their rounds

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Work! Work, children! We only have two more days until Earth Day! Work!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, excuse me? My daddy is a geologist and he says there actually isn't any concrete evidence of global warming.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's not true.  Global warming is going to kill us all.  The Republicans are responsible.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Thank you.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh no, dude.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh, there you are, boys. I need Terrance and Phillip's information so I can tell them their schedule.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Uuuh, we didn't get them.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Youuu what?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They're not together anymore, dude.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You'd better be joking. We've already announced their participation.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look, we could we could probably get Terrance, but he'll be perfoming with this other guy.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You promised us Terrance and Phillip! We therefore promised the WORLD Terrance and Phillip! You WILL get us Terrance and Phillip, or else!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But there's nothing we can do. Phillip is doing Shakespeare in Canada now.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Then you'd better get your asses to Canada and GET him. We'll make travel arrangements.  Nothing is more important than the environment, boys. Not even your lives.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well, guys, I guess we're going to Canada.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Weak.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ahhh

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Part them; they are incensed.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Nay, come, again.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Aaaah!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look to the queen there, buddih!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They bleed on both sides.  How is it, my lord?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: How is't, Laertes?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Why, as a woodcock to mine own springe, Osric;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: I am justly kill'd with mine own treachery.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: How does the queen?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hey guy, she swounds to see them bleed, buddih.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: No, no, the drink, the drink,--O my dear Hamlet,--

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: The drink, the drink! I am poison'd. Blagh! [dies]

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: O villany! Ho! let the door be lock'd:

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It is here, Hamlet: Hamlet, thou art slain;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: No medicine in the world can do thee good;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: In thee there is not half an hour of life;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: The treacherous instrument is in thy hand,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Hath turn'd itself on me lo, here I lie,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: thy mother's poison'd:

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: the king, the king's to blame.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The point!--envenom'd too!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Then, venom, to thy work, buddih! [Stabs King Claudius]

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Treason! treason!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: O, yet defend me, friends; I am but hurt.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Here, thou incestuous, murderous, damned Dane,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Drink off this potion. Is thy union here?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Blagh!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: He is served;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: It is a poison temper'd by himself.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Mine and my father's death come not upon thee,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Heaven make thee free of it! I follow thee, guy.

role: I am dead, Horatio. Wretched queen, adieu!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: You that look pale and tremble at this chance, buddih,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: That are but mutes or audience to this act, [chuckles]

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Had I but time--as this fell sergeant, death,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Is strict in his arrest--O, I could tell you, buddih--

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: But let it be. Horatio, I am dead;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Thou livest, guy; report me and my cause aright

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Never believe it:

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Here's yet some liquor left, buddih.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Jesus Tapdancing Christ, is this thing ever gonna end?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: ...he has my dying voice;

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: So tell him, with the occurrents, more and less,

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Which have solicited. The rest is silence. Blagh. [dies]

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Now cracks a noble heart. Good night sweet prince:

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest, buddih!...

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The parking lot. The play has ended. Phillip reaches his car with square tires. Stan and the boys chase him down

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Phillip! Phillip!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yes?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Our town in Colorado was chosen to host Earth Day this year and... we need a big act.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh, really? This run of Hamlet is closing down, I'm afraid. We could take it there.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, well, we were thinking how cool it would be if you and Terrance got back together for a reunion and-

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: AH! Stop right there! I'm not doin' nothin' with that fatass egomaniac!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But we need you!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, I'm sick of him taking credit for all the work and not letting me change the act. It's old and stale! I mean, do you really think that fart jokes are funny for that long?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look, if you don't come and do the show, I'll make you eat your parents!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yeah, whatever, kid.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: He'll do it, dude.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ah, look, Phillip. Everyone in South Park just wants to see your serious side.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They told us that "Phillip. He's the one with talent. Just get him for Earth Day."

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Really? Well that sounds interesting. How much does it pay?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Two thousand dollars.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I'm in! Here, call me at this number with the details.  Gotta run!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Dude, you didn't tell him Terrance would be there.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I didn't see he wouldn't be there, either. Look, all we have to do is get them there, right? Once Terrance and Phillip get together again, it'll be like old times.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh, Kyle, you just made a huge withdrawal at the First Bank of Lies.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ih-it'll be okay.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park, day. The kids put finishing touches on the various booths. The heads of the Earth Day Brainwashing Festival make their rounds again

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Work faster! Faster, children! Earth Day is coming!  Well, boys, it's rehearsal time, and your Terrance and Phillip haven't shown up.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They said they'd come.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I'm sure they'll be here any minute.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Maybe you kids don't understand how important Earth Day is for the future of our planet. Maybe you need some convincing. Carl?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (AAAAHH!)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh my God!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Excuse me, is this where the Earth Day crap is happening?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: He's here!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh. Very good. Mr. Phillip, I am Jack Farliss, head of the Earth Day Committee. Thank you for being part of this important event.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Whatever. Where's my check?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright, I'm here. Where do I-?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What's HE doing here?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright, let's do a rehearsal so that the camera crew can get a look at it.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Uhhh-woo wow! Isn't this great? You guys seeing each other again?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ee yeah, you must have a lot of catchng up to do. But let's rehearse first.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: So, this is your dong, huh, Terrance?!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: My doing?? These kids called me and said it was your idea and that you wanted to apologize.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Please, you guys. This is for Earth Day.  You care about Mother Earth, don't you?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well, what the hell? I already flew all the way out here. But I want my check made out to me, not both of us!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ditto!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Fine!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: See? I told you it would work.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright, we'll come off the speech about the dying whales, and thennn, action!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Doctor, doctor, I've cracked my ass.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Really? Let me take a look.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look closer.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Haha, hahahaha. Hahaha.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yon fart doth smell of elderberry sweet. Thou dost protes-

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Uh. What? That's not the line, asshole!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You're right. It's a better one, asshole!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Just do the bit right, dickface!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Why don't you go eat some more pudding, you fatass drug addict?!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I may be fat but at least I didn't get hair plugs!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's it! I ain't doin' nothin' with Kuko the Whale!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I never needed you in the first place, yuh hack!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You can't leave! The show starts soon!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Boys, you've got... three hours to get those two back together. Do I need to remind you what will happen if you don't? Carl!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (OOOWWW!)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You bastards!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Good luck, boys.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We've got to get them back together, you guys. They could do this to us.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Tom, I'm standing in South Park, Colorado, where Earth Day 2001 is in full force. Environmental awareness games, boths, and of course,  the entertainment on stage, which is being broadcast live all over the country. This eco-happy crowd is thrilled and waiting in anticipation for the arrival of Terrance and Phillip, who are promised by these four boys.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What a touching and true song. You know, it's true.  Republicans are ruining the earth.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Republicans are ruining the earth.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright. Well, I thnk I know why most of you tuned in today. How about some Earth Day entertainment?!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hooray for the earth! We must protect it.  And now, as promised, here are TERRANCE AND PHILLIP, on video!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: On video?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They were considered the best comedy act in all of Canada.  But a fast-paced rocket ride to success would bring themto the depths of despair.  This is Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: fWow!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What the hell do you call this?!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Eh it's "Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow." I taped it last month.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We promised people Terrance and Phillip, not a video documentary! You've ruined the earth for the last time, boys!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Aaaahh!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Terrance was born Terrance Herny Stoot, in the small Canadian village of Toronto. At a very early age his parents noticed an uncanny musical ability and decided to enroll him in the Canadian School for gifted babies.  It was here that he partnered up with Phillip Niles Argyle , a brash young baby from Montreal. Together, they performed musical acts that stunned Canadians everywhere. At the tender age of six, Terrance and Phillip were off to the United States to perform on the Ed Sullivan show . where American audiences would be exposed to Canadians for the first time.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And now, ladies and gentlemen, we have two adorable little boys from Canada. Please put your hands together for the music of young Terrance and Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Beef and lamb, chicken and ham

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Step to the left and clap your hands!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Gosh we love our chicken and ham

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Don't let it go to waste that chicken and ham!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh my God, what's wrong with their heads?!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It's alright, darling, they're just Canadian

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oooh.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Beef and lamb, chicken and ham

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Step to the left and clap your hands!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Gosh we love our chicken and ham

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
role: Don't let it go to waste that chicken and ham!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The Canadian act confused American audiences. But then something happened that would change Terrance and Phillip's act forever. It was the birth of Canadian comedy. Terrance and Phillip spent the next several years perfecting their art, and meetng some of America's most infuential people.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Excuse me, which way is the bus station?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Hey, you're the guy on the screen.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: But it was in 1974, on the Sonny & Cher Show, that Terrance and Phillip finally started to mix their Canadian humor with deep political insight.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: You know, Cher, a lot of us real Americans don't know much about Canada

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Well, a lot of us real Americans aren't as stupid and short as you, hm.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Please put your groovy hands together for the young and talented Terrance and Phillip!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Say, Terrance, I'm getting worried aboot all these Russians making missles. Maybe we should stop this cold war.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Here's a missile for ya!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's better.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: With this bold mix of humor and political insight, the world couldn't get enough of Terrance and Phillip.  But their fame would come at a price, when Behind the Blow continues.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park Elementary, front. The boys stop there to catch their breaths

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Okay. Okay, I think we lost them.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Jesus, man, those Earth Day people don't screw around!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Kyle, none of this would be happening if you hadn't LIED in the first place! You lied, and then you lied to cover up your lie!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I didn't see you complaining at the time, fat boy!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Guys, we have no choice. We're gonna have to move away. Environmental activists don't use logic or reason.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: There they are!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Haaah!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (Aahhh!)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Go! Run run run!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park stage. Behind The Blow continues

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: As they entered their late teens, Terrance and Phillip were already starting to taste the sweet milk of success.  But the price of fame was looming, as Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow continues. The '70s and '80s were a good time for young Terrance and Phillip.  Their act on the Donny and Marie Show earned them a Nobel Peace Prize. They were oin the cover of every magazine.  And then in 1998, even a saturday morning cartoon was made, based on Terrance and Phillip.  Terrance and Phillip themselves supplied the voices.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Say Terrance, what should we do aboot this strange planet we've crashed on?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I don't know, Phillip. It looks like the alien species here breathe an inert gas.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh oh, did you say what I thought you said?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: As leader of the goat people, I have seen my species nearly wiped out by your dangerous gas.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Wow, that sucks.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: The cartoon was such a huge success that it started to breed confusion over whether Terrance and Phillip were animated characters or real people. And so, in 1998,  the comedy team started work on what they thought would be their greatest achievement: A made-for-TV movie written by and starring Terrance and Phillip, called "Not Without My Anus."  It was their biggest project to date. But it had the misfortune of being scheduled on a night when a different and more pupolar show, the John Schneider Variety Hour , was supposed to air. When fans tuned in to see John Schneider and instead were treated to the Canadian made-for-TV movie , they were enraged, bewildered, and scared.  The fans revolted and burned down the network, killing six television producers and wounding twelve others.  The hatred of Terrance and Phillip had begun. Terrance fell into a deep depression and started abusing wod pulp  Phillip beat up an angry six-year-old fan and was sued for six million dollars. It was the first time the duo tasted failure , and it nearly killed them both.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: What's going on here?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Sh. We're watching "Behind the Blow," m'kay.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park. The boys run past Tom's Rhinoplasty, with the Earth Day Committee in hot pursuit

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Come on, Kenny, hurry up!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: South Park stage. Behind The Blow continues. A shot of Mr. Garrison and Phillip

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: After years of depression and suicide attempts, Terrance and Phillip finally decided to get together  for one last film:  the 1999 hit, Asses of Fire. It was one of the highest-grossing films of the summer.  And though the film also started the Canadian-American War of 1999 , in which eight million people lost their lives, the film was conisdered a great success.  After almost being executed by the Aemrican government , Terrance and Phillip were eventually returned to Canada , where they were touted as heroes.  They have been to hell and back, through the very best and the very worst of times, together, but they had seen it through.  And so ends Terrance and Phillip, Behind the Blow.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Terrance...

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Oh, Phillip. You're still here, too.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: I was just watchng this video, I ah-. You know, I've never seen it before.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Me neither.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We sssure did go through a lot together.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: We sure did.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Terrance, I-

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: No. No, Phillip, don't say it. I was an asshole, and this is mostly my fault.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's what I was gonna say: You were an asshole, and this is mostly your fault.  But, you were always the more artistically driven of us; I ssshould've put more into it than I did.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: No, Phillip, I really thought I did everything. Until I- tried to do it alone.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Think of all the endangered species that will now vanish because of you! Carl!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (AH how!)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: So long, boys!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Wait! dude, LOOK!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Thank you everyone, thank you! You know, Phillip and I have learned an important lesson: that when you go through a lot with somebody, you can't let trite things come between you.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: That's right, Terrance. You should only let trite things come between your asscheeks

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Ohohoho, nohoho!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: They're back!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Alright!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Yes! Earth Day is saved, boys! Everything worked out after all!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: It sure did.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Look, Kenny, everything turned out okay!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: (Oh, well now that's sweet.)

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: Say Terrance, can you tell me Who farted?

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: He sure did, Phillip.

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: NO, I'm asking you his name!

title: TERRANCE   PHILLIP  BEHIND THE BLOW
text: And so, Terrance and Phillip got back together, proving once and for all that fame and fortune are never as important as friendship.
